SUMMARY: More than 8,500 migrants died on land and sea routes worldwide last year, marking a record high since tallies began in 2014, according to the U.N. migration agency.

SUMMARY: Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese on Wednesday voiced concern over the recent collision between Chinese and Philippine ships in the South China Sea.
